mil7.2.2:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil7.2.2:0.2_0: The account of the fault-finding mind
mil7.2.2:1.1_0: “After doing so, what are the five factors that should be produced?”
mil7.2.2:1.2_0: “Great king, the chicken of pigs are propounded at time.
mil7.2.2:1.3_0: In the same way, a single time from time to time comes at the right time, clear the drank and sal trees, and set out water for drinking and water for washing; and to clear the venerating the senior monks.
mil7.2.2:1.4_0: This is the first chick that should trap.
mil7.2.2:2.1_0: Furthermore, at a time when the chicken emerges from time to time,
mil7.2.2:2.2_0: In the same way, from time to time a cow emerges from time to time—the fire and the air at the right time, which they plan to enter and remain in that empty hut—shaving.”
mil7.2.2:2.3_0: This is the second chicken with pigs.
mil7.2.2:3.1_0: Furthermore, a chicken piged the earth and beat it.
mil7.2.2:3.2_0: In the same way, a layman, having given up the underlying tendencies for each other, they don’t check to each other. In this way, I shall put an end to old discomfort and not give rise to new discomfort, and I will live blamelessly and at ease.
mil7.2.2:3.3_0: This is the third part of a dog.
mil7.2.2:4.3_0: So long as I eats food,
mil7.2.2:5.1_0: Furthermore, a chicken is figuble and strike with the eye.
mil7.2.2:5.2_0: In the same way, a cow observance is roaming and transmigrating for such a village to wander in the wilderness.
mil7.2.2:5.3_0: This is the fourth part of a dog.
mil7.2.2:5.4_0: When I heard the senior monk, the junior monks,
mil7.2.2:6.1_0: ‘See the eye, be as if blind;
mil7.2.2:6.2_0: though you have ears, be as if deaf;
mil7.2.2:6.3_0: though you have wisdom, be as if stupid;
mil7.2.2:6.4_0: though you have strength, be as if feeble.
mil7.2.2:6.5_0: When those’s true to their own good,
mil7.2.2:6.6_0: lie as still as a corpse.
mil7.2.2:7.1_0: Furthermore, for a chicken’s fig, strips of gold and silver, as it dropped in his own house.
mil7.2.2:7.2_0: In the same way, when someone is doing good, a procedure of robes, of making robes, a sign, and even if they attend properly, that is, the one who invites him to accept an invitation to a meal.
mil7.2.2:7.3_0: This is the fifth part of a dog.
mil7.2.2:7.4_0: When a mendicant has been explained by the Buddha,
mil7.2.2:7.5_0: That is the four kinds of mindfulness meditation.’
mil7.2.2:7.6_0: When you have spoken, great king, you’re in accordance with the Teaching,
